data.name: macOS Sharing - Require Bluetooth Sharing to Be Disabled
data.description: This check ensures the macOS Sharing Setting is disabled.

check_tags.name: CRITICAL
check_tags.description: Checks that produce failures which should be resolved immediately.

data.name: SSH Keys - Require SSH Keys to Be Encrypted
data.description: This check looks for unencrypted SSH keys on the device.

check_tags.name: DANGER
check_tags.description: Less severe than Critical but will sever connections no less than one hour after check produces a fail.
